# mcp-name: io.github.manoharanRajesh/python-version

## Pre-requisites

* Python
* uv
* NodeJs
* NPX
* Cert and key needs to be added in root directory with the name "client_cert.pem", "client_key.pem"

## Set Up

```uv sync```
```npm install @modelcontextprotocol/inspector```

## Run Inspector

```npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector uv  run main```

##Commands that might help
```uv init <<project name>>```
